definition: Jenny Lang Ping (1960-), Chinese volleyball player, coach of USA women's national team since 2005
(arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth
surname Lang
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
surname Ping

sentences.english: Lang Ping is one of the best volleyball players in the world.
sentences.chinese: 郎平是世界上最好的排球運動員之一。

sentences.english: The "Iron Hammer" signs on to coach Guangdong Evergrande Women's Volleyball Club.
sentences.chinese: “鐵榔頭”郎平簽約廣東恆大女籃俱樂部教練。

sentences.english: Madame Lang Ping used to be the head coach of China Women's Volleyball Team.
sentences.chinese: 郎平女士曾經是中國女子排球隊的主教練。

sentences.english: Lang Ping raised both arms in the air and Fangxu Yang sprinted over to embrace her.
sentences.chinese: 郎平高高舉起了雙臂，楊方旭衝過去擁抱她。

sentences.english: Does Langping guidance USA female vollyball, that is quislism?
sentences.chinese: 郎平執教美國女排，是在“賣國”？
